definition: dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]
to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of
when views are irreconcilable, it's a waste of breath to continue discussion (idiom)
pinyin: hua4 bu4 tou2 ji1 ban4 ju4 duo1

sentences.english: Fine words make winter warm, disagreeable ones make summer chilly.
sentences.chinese: 好言一句三冬暖，話不投機六月寒。

sentences.english: Painful chitchat on a train is a miserable experience.
sentences.chinese: 火車上與人話不投機是個很痛苦的經歷。

to make a terrible scene (idiom)/to throw a tantrum

definition: lit. neither a relative nor a friend (idiom)/fig. unrelated to one another in any way
